reviewText: I gave away my time travel movies that I had that were on VHS video cassette tapes.This DVD was an overly-edited MESS! I should've kept my VHS version.
summary: An excelent movie ruined by editing the h*ll out of the d*mn freakin' thing!
Title: Brother Future VHS

reviewText: If you have never seen this movie, you will probably enjoy it.  But for those of us who have waited for a dvd of this movie, you will be angry with the editing (more like butchering) that was done to this thought provoking, heartfelt movie.  I wanted to throw it in the garbage.  So my search is still on for a true dvd copy of this great movie. If anyone knows how to get and unedited version of this movie, please post.
Title: Brother Future VHS

reviewText: As a family, we loved this movie. It helped my daughters appreciate more the blessings of being free, getting an education and the joy of reading. The storyline was entertaining and although it didn't depict slavery in its "naturally brutal" state, it was a great way to introduce younger children to the horrors of our past in a mild way. It was awesome seeing the abolitionist, Denmark Vesey, portrayed. Very good acting as well. Highly recommended.
Title: Brother Future VHS

reviewText: I love this film, all should see.  It certainly gives food for thought.  In this film the young man was not interested in history, but when he was thrown back into slavery and experienced the life his ancestors lived, he certainly had a new appreciation for education.  Very good film
Title: Brother Future VHS

reviewText: This only goes for the content of the product..  The movie has been edited and doesn't include scenes that are important to the movie.  I am not happy that this was edited the way it was.  I wish that the company would make it with the full movie.
Title: Brother Future VHS

reviewText: I liked this movie. A great blend of history andentertainment. I recommend this movie. The main character wasfunny and the story was touching. If you want the DVD fastorder from Amazon not this 3rd party
Title: Brother Future VHS
